name: The great interpreters of classical music - old

metadata.name: Claudio Arrau
metadata.description:
Portrait of the Chilean classical pianist Claudio Arrau.

Edition 1/1 Original artwork by Siapou.

Created on CSP, 1280x1024 pixels, 300 dpi.

Music: Moonlight Sonata Op.27 No. 2 by Beethoven, performed by Arrau. He Was a Chilean pianist student of the master Martin Krause. He is considered one of the greatest interpreters of the 20th century. A pianist with total technical control of the instrument, he tended to disguise his great virtuosity by often adopting considerably slower tempos than normal in order to highlight the clarity of the sound and musical content.
